title: Poems: by Michaell Draiton Esquire
author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
publisher: Printed [by Valentine Simmes] for N. Ling,
notes: Signatures: A⁴ B-Y Z (-Z7,8, +chi² , chi1 signed "Z5") 2A-2I (-2I7,8).

Drayton's name on chi2v is in roman. Variant: signatures: A⁴ B-Y Z (-Z7,8, +2I7,8) 2A-2I (-2I7,8); the two-leaf cancel, originally 2I7,8, is printed in same setting as chi²  of other variant except for second leaf verso, which has Drayton's name in italic.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
